name: coredin
description: coredin test from create-web3 monorepo quickstart with vite and hardhat

scripts.setup-hooks: chmod +x ./.githooks/pre-commit && git config core.hooksPath ./.githooks && echo 'hooks ready'
scripts.build: yarn workspace @coredin/shared build && yarn workspaces foreach -A -p -i --exclude @coredin/shared run build
scripts.build-docker: docker build --file base.Dockerfile --tag coredin/base:latest . && docker build --file front.Dockerfile --tag coredin/front:latest . && docker build --file back.Dockerfile --tag coredin/back:latest .
scripts.docker: docker build . -f base.Dockerfile -t coredin/base && docker build . -f front.Dockerfile -t coredin/front && docker build . -f back.Dockerfile -t coredin/back
scripts.lint: yarn workspace @coredin/unleash-proxy lint && yarn workspace @coredin/unleash-proxy-cdk lint
scripts.lint:fix: yarn workspace @coredin/unleash-proxy lint && yarn workspace @coredin/unleash-proxy-cdk lint:fix
scripts.build-contract: cd packages/contract && cargo install cargo-post && cargo post build
